com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service
Class WatsonService

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConceptExpansion, DialogService, LanguageIdentification, LanguageTranslation, MachineTranslation, MessageResonance, NaturalLanguageClassifier, PersonalityInsights, QuestionAndAnswer, RelationshipExtraction, SpeechToText, TextToSpeech, ToneAnalyzer, TradeoffAnalytics, VisualRecognition
public abstract class WatsonService
extends Object

Watson service abstract common functionality of various Watson Services. It handle authentication and default url

Author:
German Attanasio Ruiz (germanatt@us.ibm.com)
See Also:
IBM Watson Developer Cloud

Method Detail

executeWithoutResponse

protected void executeWithoutResponse(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request)
Execute the Http request and discard the response. Use this when you don't want to get the response but you want to make sure we read it so that the underline connection is released

Parameters:
request - the request
